channel.title: PowerApps Icon Menu Builder v2 Blog

item.title: V2 RC1 Released
item.description: First release candidate of V2 is now available at Icon Menu Builder v2 RC1.
item.content:encoded:
First release candidate of V2 is now available at Icon Menu Builder v2 RC1.

This has the same component requirements as v1.

You can view the installation guide here.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the new Version 2 documentation site, its still in development and will be updated regulary.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the new Version 2 documentation site, its still in development and will be updated regulary.

Hope you find it useful.

Cheers

Pen
